original_text: David stayed in places where he would be safe. They were in the desert, and in the hill country of Ziph. Saul always tried to find David. But God did not let Saul catch David.
korean_text: 다윗이 광야의 요새에도 있었고 또 십 광야 산골에도 머물렀으므로 사울이 매일 찾되 하나님이 그를 그의 손에 넘기지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: David stayed in places where he would be safe.
and in the hill country of Ziph.
Saul always tried to find David.
But God did not let Saul catch David.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 사울이 다윗을 잡도록 내버려두지 않으셨습니다.
